metadata.Title: CVE-2017-0752 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: A elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Android framework (windowmanager). Product: Android. Versions: 4.4.4, 5.0.2, 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2. Android ID: A-62196835.

criterions.comment: android-framework-23 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
